page.title: 10MAIN ROADS,ODDINGLEY AREA
page.content: The main roads in our area are the{M5 and the{A38.}Both of these are used by commuters going into Birmingham.They are particularly busy between 8.00 & 9.00am and 5.00 & 6.00pm.At present the{M5}is in the process of being widened from two lanes to three to cope with the increasing volume of traffic.These roadworks are causing heavy congestion on the A38 because of diversions In contrast all the other roads are minor country lanes.These are typical of many country areas,narrow, winding and badly maintained.In the days of horse and carts they may have been satisfactory but now with tract- ors and other heavy vehicles they are often inadequate.Because of this traffic old canal bridges have recent- ly been renewed.{
